Identification.LongTitle: United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti (MINUSTAH) Medal Order

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: authorizes Canadians to accept and wear the United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti (MINUSTAH) Medal in recognition of at least 90 days continuous honourable service with that mission commencing on or after June 1, 2004; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: directs that the Medal follow the United Nations Mission in Ethiopia and Eritrea (UNMEE) Medal, in the order of precedence in the Canadian Honours System.
